alert.note: Alert for Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 26 at 9:13AM EST until January 27 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Oneida. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 911 AM EST, County dispatch and the media have reported isolated minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Utica, Rome, New Hartford, Westmoreland, New York Mills, Yorkville, Clinton, Waterville, Oriskany, Clayville, Clark Mills, Kirkland, Paris, Whitesboro, Chadwicks, Hubbard Corners, Colemans, and Sauquoit. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
